selections.name: Wonderdownunder
selections.reason: Placed at Sale last start over 1400m, hitting the line well. The step up to the mile looks ideal for this King's Legacy gelding. Danny O'Brien stable is firing.

selections.name: Flying Khan
selections.reason: Finished 6th last start but was only beaten 2.9L in a competitive maiden. Has experience at the mile which is a key advantage here.

selections.name: Montoya Mak
selections.reason: First starter by Dundeel out of a smart mare. Trialled okay at Geelong and draws softly. Watch betting.

selections.name: Lunar Force
selections.reason: Debutant from the Griffiths/De Kock yard. Jumpout experience suggests he has ability. Respect.

danger_horse.name: Flying Khan
danger_horse.reason: Has the race fitness and distance experience to upset.

selections.name: Angel In Black
selections.reason: Resuming. Showed excellent form last prep with a 2nd at Kyneton and 4th at Pakenham. The class runner of the field.

selections.name: Gold Coast Belle
selections.reason: Placed at this track and distance previously. Local knowledge is a plus and recent trials have been solid.

selections.name: Mahrajan
selections.reason: Finished 4th at Cranbourne on debut. Will have taken plenty of benefit from that run. Hayes stable.

selections.name: Milos Filos
selections.reason: Consistent performer who ran a good 4th at Geelong last start. Draws the rails and should be in the finish.

selections.name: Farnanheit
selections.reason: Knocking on the door with back-to-back 2nd placings at Stony Creek and Ballarat. This looks like his race to break through.

selections.name: Rumble Town
selections.reason: Ran a strong 2nd at this track two starts back. Despite the wide gate, his form is good enough to contend.

selections.name: Sacre Bleu
selections.reason: Resuming for a new stable. Showed ability last prep with a placing at Wagga. Watch market.

selections.name: Mahmudah
selections.reason: Improved effort to finish 4th at this track last start. Can run into the money at odds.

danger_horse.name: Rumble Town
danger_horse.reason: Track specialist who went close here recently.

selections.name: Silky Seth
selections.reason: Put in a career-best performance to finish 2nd at Sale last start. Strips fitter and maps well from barrier 4.

selections.name: So Enchanting
selections.reason: Placed at this track on debut. McEvoy stable has her going well and she draws the inside gate.

selections.name: Antalian
selections.reason: Consistent type with a 3rd at Kyneton last start. Rarely runs a bad race and must be included.

selections.name: The Defender
selections.reason: Experienced campaigner with multiple placings. Finished 2nd at Wangaratta recently and is in the mix.

danger_horse.name: So Enchanting
danger_horse.reason: Lightly raced improver from a top stable.

selections.name: King Kauffo
selections.reason: Ran a huge race to finish 2nd at this track and distance last start. The one to beat despite the wide draw.

selections.name: Earl Of Gloucester
selections.reason: Excellent 2nd at Kyneton over 1800m last start. Crying out for this trip and is the main danger.

selections.name: Ashina
selections.reason: Placed at Yarra Valley last start. Busuttin/Young stable stays all day. Good each-way hope.

selections.name: Harry Caviar
selections.reason: Finished 4th behind King Kauffo here last start. Meets him on similar terms and should be thereabouts.

danger_horse.name: Earl Of Gloucester
danger_horse.reason: Strong staying performance last start suggests he will relish 2200m.

selections.name: Strike Gold
selections.reason: Drops in grade here. Fitzsimmons stable is astute and this looks like a suitable assignment.

selections.name: Princess Montecito
selections.reason: Ran a respectable 5th at Pakenham last start. Moody/Coleman team must be respected in this grade.

selections.name: Lathlain
selections.reason: Resuming. Ran 7th at Flemington in tougher company before the break. Good fresh record.

selections.name: Gin O'Clock
selections.reason: Has ability on his day. 12th last start was poor but can bounce back in this weaker field.

danger_horse.name: Princess Montecito
danger_horse.reason: Draws well and has the class to feature.

selections.name: Maktoob
selections.reason: Consistent galloper who finished 2nd at Sale last start. Maps perfectly from barrier 2 and looks hard to beat.

selections.name: Sir Davy
selections.reason: Class runner of the field with a 76 rating. Carries weight but has the ability to blow these away.

selections.name: Phoebe Buffay
selections.reason: Last start winner at this track over 1400m. Steps up to the mile which suits and loves this course.

selections.name: Leveraged Buyout
selections.reason: Drops significantly in grade from a run at Caulfield. Can improve sharply here.

selections.name: Sussex Duchess
selections.reason: Finished a strong 2nd at Pakenham last start. Looks well placed here to go one better.

selections.name: Baked
selections.reason: Last start winner at Moe. Freedman stable has her flying and she can repeat the dose.

selections.name: Lujaego
selections.reason: Broke maiden status with a win at Wangaratta last start. Confidence is high.

selections.name: Chocolate Box
selections.reason: Consistent type who placed at Pakenham recently. Always around the mark.

selections.name: Akicita
selections.reason: Won at this track and distance last start. Draws the rails and looks set to repeat.

selections.name: Ka Ying Cheer
selections.reason: Last start winner at Pakenham. In form and represents the main danger.

selections.name: Damas
selections.reason: Another last start winner at this track. Loves the course and must be included.

selections.name: Thailess
selections.reason: Finished 2nd at Geelong last start. Consistent mare who will be running on.
